availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William McGlone, Sr. (Carter County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jamimah Clark McGlone in Lewis County, Kentucky, on January 12, 1829. Father of Alfred McGlone, Sarah McGlone, Elizabeth McGlone, Nancy McGlone, George McGlone, John McGlone, Martha McGlone, Jemima McGlone, and William McGlone, Jr. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 232B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 158-159.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film 000344051.
Robert E. McGlone and Thomas H. McGlone, The McGlones: A Series on the McGlone Name as Researched in the United States, (McGlone and Associates, 1980), p. 46-47.
